FuncDef: If enabled, this command will make the system send a refresh at the configured time. A refresh message is an ARP-request message that uses 0s as sender's IP for the case of a proxy-ARP entry. For proxy-ND entries, a refresh is a regular NS message using the chassis-mac as MAC source-address.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the send-refresh in seconds. Values-120 to 86400.
